verses.text: \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahasuerus \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*’ \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w*, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Esther \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*. \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Esther \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*.
